title: Rewards: Summoner Icons

embed.description: Pick'em is a two-part challenge in which you predict how well teams will perform at the 2015 World Championship.

body: Alright I got 40 points by Knockout Stage  i waited four days to get the icon i still didn't get the icon can someone help me please ?

replies.body:
Hey EzSavage, 

I got in touch with Riot with the same question and they informed me to reach out to them on November 4th if we still don't have the icon in our list. 

Riot Support ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Twitter: @Riotsupport

Hope this helps buddy! Who do you think is gonna win worlds?? 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
